text: The men's 110 metres hurdles event at the 1994 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Lisbon, Portugal, at Estádio Universitário de Lisboa on 21 and 22 July. 106.7cm (3'6) (senior implement) hurdles were used. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Frank Busemann ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Dudley Dorival ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Darius Pemberton ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 22 July Wind: +2.1 m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !!
